meta.title: Main Terminal — Observe, Dispatch & Business Objectives Integration
meta.description: Tests the unified terminal (local: service_registry + agent-core CLI; cloud: CRMLite /api/agent/*) for observing Claude Code MCP agents, dispatching actions, and achieving all business objectives with full memory+data plane integration.

features.name: service_registry: list_services returns all registered services
features.description: dispatch('system.list_services') returns dict with >30 service keys including acd, crm, dm, research, memory, workflow

features.name: service_registry: list_topics for 'acd' service
features.description: list_topics(service='acd') returns at least 9 topics: start_harness, stop_harness, harness_status, harness_logs, list_harnesses, list_projects, import_project, dashboard_stats, wake

features.name: service_registry: dispatch to unknown topic returns fuzzy suggestions
features.description: dispatch('acd.typo_status') returns ok=False with suggestions list of similar valid topics

features.name: service_registry: dispatch returns structured envelope
features.description: Every dispatch call returns {ok, topic, result, duration_ms} — no raw handler output

features.name: service_registry: all services have non-empty description
features.description: Every entry in list_services() has a non-empty description string

features.name: service_registry: list_topics with tag filter
features.description: list_topics(tag='info') returns only topics tagged 'info'; all results have that tag

features.name: service_registry: dispatch duration_ms is recorded
features.description: Each dispatch envelope includes duration_ms > 0

features.name: service_registry: system.self_test passes all checks
features.description: dispatch('system.self_test') returns ok=True and lists all tested components

features.name: service_registry: HTTP callable — POST /api/services/system/list_services
features.description: HTTP POST to service_registry HTTP layer returns same result as local dispatch('system.list_services')

features.name: service_registry: CLI call mode — python -m service_registry call system.list_services
features.description: CLI mode produces JSON output with services list without error

features.name: ACD observe: harness_status returns running state
features.description: dispatch('acd.harness_status') returns status field ('running', 'stopped', or 'unknown') and lastUpdate

features.name: ACD observe: list_projects returns repo queue entries
features.description: dispatch('acd.list_projects') returns array of projects with id, name, priority, enabled, and progress fields

features.name: ACD observe: dashboard_stats returns session totals
features.description: dispatch('acd.dashboard_stats') returns totalSessions, totalCost, and active worker count

features.name: ACD observe: harness_logs returns recent log lines
features.description: dispatch('acd.harness_logs', {lines: 20}) returns logs array with at least 1 entry

features.name: ACD observe: list_harnesses shows all worker processes
features.description: dispatch('acd.list_harnesses') returns array of harness instances with pid, status, repoId

features.name: ACD observe: project feature progress visible in list_projects
features.description: Each project in list_projects has passing, total, percent fields from the feature list JSON

features.name: ACD observe: parallel-status.json readable from terminal
features.description: Terminal can read and parse /harness/parallel-status.json showing current worker assignments and serialGroups

features.name: ACD observe: NL intent 'acd status' maps to acd.harness_status
features.description: conversation_interpreter.interpret('acd status') → intent='acd', action_name='acd_status'

features.name: ACD observe: NL intent 'how many features left' maps to ACD
features.description: interpret('how many features left') → intent='acd'

features.name: ACD observe: agent-core CLI 'agent health' returns system state
features.description: Running 'agent health --json' from terminal returns JSON with db, memory, tools health fields

features.name: ACD dispatch: start_harness successfully starts parallel runner
features.description: dispatch('acd.start_harness', {workers: 2, dryRun: true}) returns ok=True and sessionId

features.name: ACD dispatch: stop_harness sends graceful shutdown signal
features.description: dispatch('acd.stop_harness') returns ok=True with message confirming stop signal sent

features.name: ACD dispatch: wake resumes suspended harness
features.description: dispatch('acd.wake') returns ok=True with message confirming harness was woken

features.name: ACD dispatch: import_project adds new repo to queue
features.description: dispatch('acd.import_project', {id: 'test-import', path: '/tmp/test', priority: 99}) returns ok=True with projectId

features.name: ACD dispatch: NL 'start the acd' maps to acd.start_harness
features.description: interpret('start the acd') → intent='acd', action_name='acd_start'

features.name: ACD dispatch: NL 'wake the acd' maps to acd.wake
features.description: interpret('wake the acd') → intent='acd', action_name='acd_wake'

features.name: ACD dispatch: NL 'restart the harness' maps to acd.start_harness
features.description: interpret('restart the harness') → intent='acd', action_name='acd_start'

features.name: ACD dispatch: approval gate auto-approves for admin dispatch
features.description: dispatch('system.approval_gate') with admin context returns approved=True without blocking

features.name: ACD dispatch: agent-core CLI 'agent run' submits goal as ACD task
features.description: 'agent run "implement feature X in safari-automation" --mode dry_run' completes without error and returns job_id

features.name: ACD dispatch: agent-core CLI 'agent status <job_id>' returns job state
features.description: After 'agent run', 'agent status <job_id> --json' returns status, steps, and elapsed_ms

features.name: Data plane: system.heartbeat returns all service statuses
features.description: dispatch('system.heartbeat') returns ok=True and a services dict with health per service (local + cloud)

features.name: Data plane: system.full_status aggregates all subsystems
features.description: dispatch('system.full_status') returns crm, dm, outreach, content, revenue, safari, memory fields in single response

features.name: Data plane: research.platform returns market research data
features.description: dispatch('research.platform', {platform: 'twitter', keyword: 'solopreneur'}) returns posts with author, engagement

features.name: Data plane: dm.health returns per-platform DM service status
features.description: dispatch('dm.health') returns health status for instagram, twitter, tiktok DM services

features.name: Data plane: dm.conversations returns active DM threads
features.description: dispatch('dm.conversations', {platform: 'twitter'}) returns list of conversation objects

features.name: Data plane: linkedin.status returns LinkedIn service health and rate limits
features.description: dispatch('linkedin.status') returns healthy bool, rate_limit_remaining, and activeHours flag

features.name: Data plane: publish.auto routes content to correct platform
features.description: dispatch('publish.auto', {content_type: 'video', platform: 'youtube'}) routes to correct publisher without error

features.name: Data plane: crm.list_contacts returns paginated contacts
features.description: dispatch('crm.list_contacts', {limit: 10}) returns array of contact objects with score, stage, platform fields

features.name: Data plane: workflow.list returns all workflow definitions
features.description: dispatch('workflow.list') returns array of workflow slugs including 'research-to-publish'

features.name: Data plane: revenue.dashboard returns unified revenue metrics
features.description: dispatch('revenue.dashboard') returns mrr, arr, subscriber_count, conversion_rate from RevenueCat + Stripe

features.name: Data plane: feedback.analysis returns strategy insights
features.description: dispatch('feedback.analysis', {platform: 'twitter', niche: 'solopreneur'}) returns winning_patterns and prompt_guidelines

features.name: Data plane: twitter.metrics returns engagement stats
features.description: dispatch('twitter.metrics') returns impressions, likes, retweets, engagement_rate for recent posts

features.name: Data plane: safari.health returns all Safari service ports
features.description: dispatch('safari.health') returns health status for all 9 Safari automation services (ports 3001-3108)

features.name: Data plane: upwork.status returns job monitoring state
features.description: dispatch('upwork.status') returns job_watches count, recent_proposals, and service health

features.name: Data plane: social.metrics returns cross-platform engagement summary
features.description: dispatch('social.metrics') returns per-platform engagement totals for instagram, twitter, tiktok, threads

features.name: Memory plane: memory.write stores knowledge to vault
features.description: dispatch('memory.write', {type: 'knowledge', content: 'test fact', tags: ['test']}) returns ok=True and memory_id

features.name: Memory plane: agent-core CLI 'agent memory search' finds written memories
features.description: 'agent memory search "test fact" --json' returns results including the previously written memory

features.name: Memory plane: agent-core conversation checkpoint created after run
features.description: After 'agent run', a checkpoint exists for the job_id that can be listed via 'agent checkpoint list <job_id>'

features.name: Memory plane: cognitive.score_event rates business signals
features.description: dispatch('cognitive.score_event', {event: 'new_lead', source: 'twitter'}) returns score 0-10 and routing decision

features.name: Memory plane: graph entities can be queried from terminal
features.description: dispatch('graph.entities', {limit: 10}) returns entity records from the knowledge graph

features.name: Memory plane: chat.history returns recent conversation turns
features.description: dispatch('chat.history', {session_id: 'main', limit: 5}) returns messages array with role and content

features.name: Memory plane: lesson_store contains after-action review lessons
features.description: agent-core LessonStore can be queried and returns at least 1 lesson with context and outcome fields

features.name: Memory plane: goal_registry lists active goals
features.description: goal_registry.list_active() returns goals with id, title, status, and key_results fields

features.name: Memory plane: Supabase actp_agent_memory accessible via data plane
features.description: DataPlane can query actp_agent_memory table and return recent memory rows

features.name: Memory plane: open_loop_tracker identifies unresolved goals
features.description: open_loop_tracker.get_open_loops() returns list of goals with no confirmed completion

features.name: Cloud terminal: CRMLite /api/agent/status returns unified observability
features.description: GET /api/agent/status returns crm_stats, pipeline summary, worker health, and ACD integration status

features.name: Cloud terminal: CRMLite /api/agent/context returns full session init
features.description: GET /api/agent/context returns contacts, unread messages, follow-ups, campaigns, and workflow state

features.name: Cloud terminal: CRMLite /api/agent/audit returns action history
features.description: GET /api/agent/audit returns audit log entries with action, actor, timestamp, duration_ms fields

features.name: Cloud terminal: Workflow Engine /api/health returns running
features.description: GET https://workflow-engine.vercel.app/api/health returns status=running

features.name: Cloud terminal: Workflow Engine /api/workflows returns definitions
features.description: GET /api/workflows returns array including 'research-to-publish' definition with 6 steps

features.name: Cloud terminal: Workflow Engine /api/workflows/executions shows running jobs
features.description: GET /api/workflows/executions returns executions array with status, startedAt fields

features.name: Cloud terminal: ACD dashboard /api/agent-status returns worker grid data
features.description: GET http://localhost:3000/api/agent-status returns parallel workers array with robustness, features, health fields

features.name: Cloud terminal: dispatch 'crm.create_contact' via CRMLite action route
features.description: POST /api/agent/action {action: 'crm.create_contact', params: {name: 'Test', platform: 'twitter'}} returns ok=True

features.name: Cloud terminal: dispatch 'workflow.start' via CRMLite action route
features.description: POST /api/agent/action {action: 'workflow.start', params: {slug: 'research-to-publish'}} returns execution_id

features.name: Cloud terminal: dispatch 'crm.advance_pipeline' via CRMLite action route
features.description: POST /api/agent/action {action: 'crm.advance_pipeline', params: {contact_id: X, stage: 'consideration'}} returns ok

features.name: Cloud terminal: dispatch 'agent.save_health_snapshot' stores state
features.description: POST /api/agent/action {action: 'agent.save_health_snapshot'} writes row to actp_agent_health_snapshots

features.name: Cloud terminal: dispatch 'crm.search_contacts' via CRMLite action route
features.description: POST /api/agent/action {action: 'crm.search_contacts', params: {query: 'solopreneur'}} returns matching contacts

features.name: Cloud terminal: all 14 CRMLite action types are registered and callable
features.description: POST /api/agent/action with each of the 14 documented actions returns ok=True or structured error (not 404)

features.name: Business objective: outreach — dispatch DM to prospect from terminal
features.description: dispatch('dm.send', {platform: 'twitter', username: 'IsaiahDupree7', text: 'Terminal dispatch test'}) returns success

features.name: Business objective: outreach — process pending DM queue
features.description: dispatch('dm.process_outreach') drains pending outreach queue and returns sent_count, failed_count

features.name: Business objective: content — trigger content generation pipeline
features.description: dispatch('orchestrator.research_to_publish', {niche: 'solopreneur', platform: 'twitter'}) returns job_id for the pipeline

features.name: Business objective: content — publish queued content via terminal
features.description: dispatch('publish.lite', {account_id: '571', platform: 'twitter', text: 'Terminal test post'}) returns submission_id

features.name: Business objective: market research — run full sweep from terminal
features.description: dispatch('research.keyword', {keyword: 'solopreneur'}) returns cross-platform results for all 4 platforms

features.name: Business objective: LinkedIn prospecting triggered from terminal
features.description: dispatch('linkedin.prospect', {query: 'founder saas'}) returns prospect list with AI scores

features.name: Business objective: Upwork job scan triggered from terminal
features.description: dispatch('upwork.scan') returns new_jobs_found count and top_job_score

features.name: Business objective: revenue check — RevenueCat MRR from terminal
features.description: dispatch('revcat.mrr') returns current_mrr, subscriber_count, and period

features.name: Business objective: YouTube analytics from terminal
features.description: dispatch('youtube.analytics') returns views, subscribers, and watch_time_hours for last 30 days

features.name: Business objective: feedback cycle triggered from terminal
features.description: dispatch('feedback.twitter_cycle') runs check-backs → classify → strategy update and returns cycle_summary

features.name: Business objective: Telegram notification dispatched from terminal
features.description: dispatch('telegram.send', {message: 'Terminal dispatch test'}) delivers message to Telegram without error

features.name: Business objective: Meta ads spend check from terminal
features.description: dispatch('meta_ads.spend') returns today_spend, campaign_count, and top_roas_campaign

features.name: Business objective: Sora video generation triggered from terminal
features.description: dispatch('sora.generate', {prompt: 'test video', dry_run: true}) returns job_id without error

features.name: Business objective: comments engagement dispatched from terminal
features.description: dispatch('comments.threads_engage', {niche: 'solopreneur', dry_run: true}) returns planned_comments list

features.name: Cross-integration: local dispatch syncs to cloud CRM
features.description: dispatch('dm.sync') pushes new DM conversations to CRMLite and returns synced_count

features.name: Cross-integration: memory written locally appears in cloud audit
features.description: After dispatch('memory.write'), CRMLite /api/agent/audit shows the memory write action

features.name: Cross-integration: workflow started from cloud terminal calls local task
features.description: Workflow execution with step type 'local_task' creates entry in actp_workflow_tasks that local worker can claim

features.name: Cross-integration: ACD feature progress visible in cloud CRM status
features.description: CRMLite /api/agent/status includes acd_progress field showing total passing/total features across all repos

features.name: Cross-integration: terminal can query Supabase feedback strategy
features.description: DataPlane.feedback_strategy_latest(platform='twitter', niche='solopreneur') returns strategy from cloud Supabase

features.name: Cross-integration: goal completion triggered from terminal updates cloud CRM pipeline
features.description: Completing a goal via agent-core advances the linked CRM contact to next pipeline stage

features.name: Cross-integration: cognitive.score_event output routed to memory and Telegram
features.description: High-score event (>=8) is written to memory vault AND sends Telegram alert

features.name: Cross-integration: local + cloud data merged in system.full_status
features.description: system.full_status includes both local process data (pid, uptime) and cloud data (crm_count, workflow_runs)

features.name: Audit: every dispatch call is logged in event bus
features.description: After 10 dispatch calls, event_bus log contains entries for each with topic, duration_ms, ok fields

features.name: Audit: CRMLite action endpoint writes to actp_agent_audit_log
features.description: After POST /api/agent/action, Supabase actp_agent_audit_log contains new row with action_type and params

features.name: Audit: parallel-output.log captures all worker activity
features.description: parallel-output.log exists and contains timestamped entries for each worker session

features.name: Audit: failed dispatch returns structured error with duration
features.description: Any failed dispatch returns {ok: false, topic, error, duration_ms} — never an unhandled exception

features.name: Audit: CRMLite /api/agent/audit supports filter by action_type
features.description: GET /api/agent/audit?action_type=crm.create_contact returns only that action type in results

features.name: Audit: agent-core CLI 'agent jobs' lists all recent jobs
features.description: 'agent jobs --recent 5 --json' returns 5 most recent jobs with status, goal, and started_at

features.name: Audit: agent-core CLI 'agent explain <job_id>' returns step breakdown
features.description: 'agent explain <job_id>' returns list of steps with tool_name, action, ok, and duration_ms per step

features.name: Reporting: test results written to tests/terminal_dispatch_results.json
features.description: After all tests, results file exists with summary.total=103, summary.passed, summary.failed, runAt

features.name: Reporting: pytest collection >= 103 tests
features.description: python -m pytest tests/test_terminal_dispatch_comprehensive.py --collect-only returns >= 103 test items

features.name: Reporting: all tests runnable without real credentials (mocked)
features.description: pytest --mock-all completes without ImportError or MissingToken errors; real services mocked via fixtures

features.name: Reporting: integration-marked tests separated from unit tests
features.description: Tests requiring live services are marked @pytest.mark.integration and skippable with -m 'not integration'

features.name: Reporting: feature list updated with passes=true after each batch
features.description: After every 10 tests written, test-terminal-dispatch.json features marked passes=true for completed tests

features.name: Reporting: git commit with pass rate
features.description: git commit -m 'test(terminal): XX/103 terminal dispatch tests — observe+dispatch+memory+cloud' is executed
